column2: Nova School of Business and Economics
column5: The world is addressing grand challenges through the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), an urgent call for action that provides a shared blueprint for peace and prosperity for people and the planet, now and into the future.If you want to tackle some of these grand challenges and create real impact, the Master's in Impact Entrepreneurship & Innovation will help you with the needed attitude and mindset change, offering a project-based and action-oriented program.Either by developing your own social venture or implementing a new social innovation idea, with this program you will be able to create real impact!Are you ready to become an agent of change so you can transform the world in responsible and inclusive ways?
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
